div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

In ten years; i imagine myself with my wife and 3 or 4 children living in our house in Africa,that concerns only my family view, but professionaly i hope to be a governor of one region of my beautiful country, to help with the knowledges i have acquired here in europ , the processus of developpement technologic, economic and so on.
